elements.text:
HANDWRITING

Over the past week, have people usually had trouble reading your handwriting?

buttons: 1::1: Slight: My writing is slow, clumsy or uneven, but all words are clear.
2::2: Mild: Some words are unclear and difficult to read.
3::3: Moderate: Many words are unclear and difficult to read.
4::4: Severe: Most or all words cannot be read.
